sect2.title: E2fsprogs Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, strip Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, cp, echo, expr, hostname, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, sync, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0 Glibc: ldconfig Grep: egrep, grep Gzip: gzip Make: make Gawk: awk Sed: sed Texinfo: makeinfo
